# thalassa_snapshot_policy (Data Source)

Get a snapshot policy



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `identity` (String) Identity of the snapshot policy
- `name` (String) Name of the snapshot policy
- `organisation_id` (String) Reference to the Organisation of the Snapshot Policy. If not provided, the organisation of the (Terraform) provider will be used.

### Read-Only

- `annotations` (Map of String) Annotations for the snapshot policy
- `description` (String) Description of the snapshot policy
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the snapshot policy is enabled
- `id` (String) Identity of the snapshot policy
- `keep_count` (Number) Maximum number of snapshots to retain
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels for the snapshot policy
- `last_snapshot_at` (String) When the last snapshot was created
- `next_snapshot_at` (String) When the next snapshot will be created
- `region` (String) Region of the snapshot policy
- `schedule` (String) Cron schedule for the snapshot policy
- `slug` (String) Slug of the snapshot policy
- `target` (List of Object) Target configuration for the snapshot policy (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--target))
- `timezone` (String) Timezone for the snapshot policy schedule
- `ttl` (String) Time to live for snapshots created by this policy (e.g., 168h, 7d)

<a id="nestedatt--target"></a>
### Nested Schema for `target`

Read-Only:

- `selector` (Map of String)
- `type` (String)
- `volume_identities` (List of String)
